resources.string: Collar runs in the background and reminds you to get back in touch with old friends.
Touching the blue countdown timer will skip the countdown and force a notification.
The number-picker below changes the frequency of notifications.
Touching the clock on the top right will refresh the countdown timer.
When you receive a notification, touch \'Go!\' to make a call.
Pressing \'Later\' will make the person more likely to appear again.
Pressing \'Nope\' will make the person less likely to appear again.
Deleting the notification will make the person equally likely to appear again.
